pages.text: Water can be extracted from the varieties of birch.
Lava can be extracted from the nether trees.
Latex can be extracted from sharinga trees. Used to make dry rubber in the $(l:materials/evaporation_tower)Evaporation Tower$().
Maple sap can be extracted from maple trees. Used to make maple syrup in the $(l:materials/evaporation_tower)Evaporation Tower$().
Juglone can be extracted from black walnut trees. Used to craft herbicide.
Sap can be extracted from any other deciduous tree. Used to make sugar in the $(l:materials/evaporation_tower)Evaporation Tower$().
Resin can be extracted from any other coniferous tree. Used to make amber in the $(l:materials/evaporation_tower)Evaporation Tower$().
